ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller

Class LeagueAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.LeagueAnalysis

  • public class LeagueAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main functional class in the system It provides three methods to analyze the performance of the team or the players It needs to know the league the user is interested in
    Author:
    Omar

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player[] getMostPenalizedPlayers()
      Returns the five players with most number of infractions
      Player[] getTopPlayersbyV()
      Returns the top 25 (or less) players present in the league analyzed
      Team[] getTopTeamsbyV()
      Returns the top 25 (or less) of the teams present in the league analyzed
      java.lang.Object[][] getTwoDimTopPlayersbyV()
      Returns a two dimensional object array with all the data for every top players
      java.lang.Object[][] getTwoDimTopTeamsbyV()
      Returns a two dimensional object array with all the data for every top teams
